016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
021
022import java.util.Iterator;
023import java.util.Map;
024
025public record Vocabularies(ObjectNode json)
026    implements Iterable<Map.Entry<String, Boolean>>
027{
028
029    public record Builder(ObjectNode builder) {
030        public Builder() {
031            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
032        }
033
034        Builder vocabulary(String url, boolean value)
035        {
036            builder.set(url, builder.booleanNode(value));
037            return this;
038        }
039
040        public Vocabularies build()
041        {
042            return new Vocabularies(builder);
043        }
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Boolean>> iterator() {
048        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> iterator = json.fields();
049        return new Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Boolean>>() {
050            @Override
051            public boolean hasNext() {
052                return iterator.hasNext();
053            }
054
055            @Override
056            public Map.Entry<String, Boolean> next() {
057                Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = iterator.next();
058                return new Map.Entry<String, Boolean>() {
059                    @Override
060                    public String getKey() {
061                        return next.getKey();
062                    }
063
064                    @Override
065                    public Boolean getValue() {
066                        return next.getValue().booleanValue();
067                    }
068
069                    @Override
070                    public Boolean setValue(Boolean value) {
071                        return next.setValue(json.booleanNode(value)).booleanValue();
072                    }
073                };
074            }
075        };
076    }
077}
